main event: Multiple military personnel observed a recurring light at Camp Hood, Texas on 23 May 1949, including descriptions of the object being similar to an automobile headlight.
interesting points: The light was described as having a yellowish tinge and moving in slow maneuvers up and down,The light was observed by different military personnel at various times throughout the night,The object changed altitude slightly and was visible for several minutes at a time,Sightings were corroborated by multiple witnesses,The conclusion of the investigation suggested the object might be ground lights or automobile headlights.
witness description: soldiers from various divisions stationed at Camp Hood
